mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mypetcare.sitter( ps_no, ps_activity, ps_score, ps_certificate, ps_area, ps_possibledate, ps_lastpossibledate, ps_introduce, ps_img, ps_smoking, ps_career, ps_size stop_reason )VALUES ( 1, null, null, #{ps_certificate}, #{ps_area}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{ps_introduce}, #{ps_img}, #{ps_smoking}, #{ps_career}, null, #{ps_size}, null )
